Description: Limestone ostracon: on one side only, eleven incomplete and faded lines of a (model?) letter written by the scribe Maanakhtef to the vizier Neferrenpet.The text is a palimpsest over some trial sketches, e.g. an arm and a hand holding a composite bow.
Curator's comments: For the text cf. a fragmentary letter written by the same(?) Maanakhtef to another vizier, P. Deir el-Medineh XIII, in J. J. Černy, 'Papyrus hiératiques de Deir el-Médineh' I (Cairo, 1978), pp. 25-6 and pls. 29-29a. Bibliography: K.Kitchen, 'Ramesside Inscriptions' VII (Oxford, 1983), 354.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (136376) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/136376)
